name: My Candy Love Forum - Puku
css:
@-moz-document domain("mycandylove.com"),domain("amordoce.com"),domain("sweetamoris.de"),domain("minsodeflirt.dk"),domain("corazondemelon.es"),domain("flirttistoori.com"),domain("amoursucre.com"),domain("csabitasboljeles.hu"),domain("dolceflirt.it"),domain("mijnzoeteliefde.nl"),domain("sukkersotkjaerlighet.com"),domain("slodkiflirt.pl"),domain("sweetflirt.ro"),domain("sladkiiflirt.ru"),domain("sockerflirt.se"),domain("askito-m.com"),domain("sweetcrush.co.uk") {

#cadre-inner {background : white!important ;} /*Page Background*/
    
    .pun.header {background :  #f5edff !important ;} /*Top Horizontal Menu*/
    .pun.header a {color : #8823ff !important ;} /*Text color for the top horizontal menu*/
    
    .pun h2 span {color : #8823ff !important ;} /*Section title: first word*/
    
    h2, .integrated-title2 {color : #fc6d88 !important ;} /*Section title: the rest*/

    #forum thead {
        background : #b270ff !important ; /*Header*/
        border-color : #8823ff  !important ; /*Header table borders*/
    }
    .inbox thead th {color : white !important ;} /*Header table text color */
    
    #forum td.col1 .icon_offset h3 a, #forum td.col1 .icon_offset .modo a {color : #b270ff !important ;} /*Section title (Daily Candy, Guestbook ...)*/
    
    #forum tbody {background : white ;} /*Table*/
    
    legend, table, caption, tbody, tfoot, thead, tr, th, td {color : grey !important ;} /*Number of discussions and messages*/
    
/*Forum subsection*/
    
    .pun_topic_page .col2, .pun_topic_page .col3 {background : #b270ff !important ; /*Table header (columns 2 and 3)*/}
    
    .pun_topic_page .col2.sticked_col, .pun_topic_page .col3.sticked_col {background : #ffe6ee !important ; /*Columns 2 and 3 pinned */}
    
    .col3.altcol, .col2.altcol {background : #ffe6ee !important ; /*Columns 2 and 3 not pinned*/}
    
    .icon_offset.icon_offset_new strong {color : #90D1EE !important ;} /*Color topic titles*/
    
    .pun_topic_page .col4 .summary {color : #fc6d88 !important ; /*Copyright text color of the last message*/}
    
    .icon_offset.icon_offset_new a {color : grey !important ;} /*color "new messages" and numbers*/
    
/*Topics*/
    /*For admins*/
    #forum .pun.box.group1 {border-color : #236EC0 !important ;} /*Message border color*/
    
    #forum .pun.box.group1 > h2, #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group1 .post_right .infos {background : #bfe5f6 !important ;} /*Message date bar*/
    #forum .pun.forum_post.group1 > h2 > span, #forum .pun.forum_post.group1 > h2 > a {color : grey !important ;} /*Publication date color*/
    .pun.group1 h2 span.numbering, .pun.group1 h2 span.date {color : #236EC0 !important ;} /*Post number Color*/
    
    #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group1 .post {border-color : #90d1ee !important ;} /*Column author (Part 1)*/
    #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group1 div.author_bottom, #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group1 div.author {background : #90d1ee !important ;} /*Column author (Part 2)*/
    #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group1 .author .author_name .summary, #forum .pun.box.group1 > .inbox .author .author_name strong {color : #236EC0 !important ;}/*Nickname*/
    #forum .pun.box.group1 > .inbox .author .author_title strong {color : #ec3a56 !important ;} /*Status*/
    .group1 .author_infos>div {color : #236EC0 !important ;} /*Number of messages*/
    #forum .pun.box.group1 > .inbox .author_bottom p {color : #236EC0 !important ;} /*Online?*/
    
    #forum .pun.box.group2 > .inbox.group2 .post_left, #forum .pun.box.group2 > .inbox.group2 .username, #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group2, #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group2 div.post, #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group2 div.post_bottom {background : white !important ;} /*Message background*/
    .group2 span.pun_center {color : black !important ;} /*Message color*/
    .group2 span.pun_center a {color : #236EC0 !important ;} /*Color of links in the message*/
    
    /*For Mods*/
    #forum .pun.box.group2 {border-color : #8823ff !important ;} /*Message border color*/
    
    #forum .pun.box.group2 > h2, #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group2 .post_right .infos {background : 
#e6d4ff !important ;} /*Message date bar*/
    #forum .pun.forum_post.group2 > h2 > span, #forum .pun.forum_post.group2 > h2 > a {color : grey !important ;} /*Publication date color*/
    .pun.group2 h2 span.numbering, .pun.group2 h2 span.date {color : #8823ff !important ;} /*Post number color*/
    
    #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group2 .post {border-color : #d4b5ff !important ;} /*Column author (Part 1)*/
    #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group2 div.author_bottom, #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group2 div.author {background : #d4b5ff !important ;} /*Column author (Part 2)*/
    #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group2 .author .author_name .summary, #forum .pun.box.group2 > .inbox .author .author_name strong {color : #8823ff !important ;}/*Nickname*/
    #forum .pun.box.group2 > .inbox .author .author_title strong {color : #ec3a56 !important ;} /*Status*/
    .group2 .author_infos>div {color : #8823ff !important ;} /*Number of messages*/
    #forum .pun.box.group2 > .inbox .author_bottom p {color : #8823ff  !important ;} /*Online?*/
    
    #forum .pun.box.group2 > .inbox.group2 .post_left, #forum .pun.box.group2 > .inbox.group2 .username, #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group2, #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group2 div.post, #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group2 div.post_bottom {background : white !important ;} /*Background message*/
    .group2 span.pun_center {color : black !important ;} /*Message color*/
    .group2 span.pun_center a {color : #90D1EE !important ;} /*Color of links in the message*/
    
    /*For players*/
    #forum .pun.box.group4 {border-color : #fc6d88 !important ;} /*Message border color*/
    
    #forum .pun.box.group4 > h2, #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group4 .post_right .infos {background : #ffe9f0 !important ;} /*Message date bar*/
    #forum .pun.forum_post.group4 > h2 > span, #forum .pun.forum_post.group4 > h2 > a {color : grey !important ;} /*Publication date color*/
    .pun.group4 h2 span.numbering, .pun.group4 h2 span.date {color : #fc6d88 !important ;} /*Post number Color*/
    
    #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group4 .post {border-color : #ffccdd !important ;} /*Column author (Part 1)*/
    #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group4 div.author_bottom, #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group4 div.author {background : #ffccdd !important ;} /*Column author (Part 2)*/
    #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group4 .author .author_name .summary, #forum .pun.box.group4 > .inbox .author .author_name strong {color : #fc6d88 !important ;}/*Nickname*/
    #forum .pun.box.group4 > .inbox .author .author_title strong {color : #ec3a56 !important ;} /*Status*/
    .group4 .author_infos>div {color : #fc6d88 !important ;} /*Number of Messages*/
    #forum .pun.box.group4 > .inbox .author_bottom p {color : #fc6d88 !important ;} /*Online?*/
    
    #forum .pun.box.group2 > .inbox.group2 .post_left, #forum .pun.box.group2 > .inbox.group2 .username, #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group2, #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group2 div.post, #forum .pun.box > .inbox.group2 div.post_bottom {background : white !important ;} /*Message background*/
    .group2 span.pun_center {color : black !important ;} /*Message Color*/
    .group2 span.pun_center a {color : #236EC0 !important ;} /*Color of links in the message*/   
    
    /*Type 3: unknown; Type 5: deleted player*/
    
    #forum h4.punmob_spoil {background : #b682ff !important ; color : white !important ;} /*Spoiler title*/
    #forum span.punmob_spoil {color : black !important ; background : #fff0f0 !important ;} /*Spoiler body*/
    
    #forum blockquote {background : white !important ; color : black !important ;} /*Block of text or code*/
    
    .pun.footbox {background : white !important ;} /*Stats frame*/
}
